CIS-01.name: Inventory and Control of Enterprise Assets
CIS-01.description: Maintain an accurate inventory of assets and ensure authorized use only.

CIS-04.name: Secure Configuration of Enterprise Assets and Software
CIS-04.description: Establish and maintain secure configurations, remediating vulnerabilities promptly.

CIS-07.name: Continuous Vulnerability Management
CIS-07.description: Continuously acquire and remediate vulnerabilities, prioritizing based on risk.

CIS-11.name: Secure Configuration for Network Infrastructure
CIS-11.description: Establish secure configurations for network devices such as firewalls and load balancers.

CIS-13.name: Data Protection
CIS-13.description: Develop processes to identify, classify, securely handle, retain, and dispose of data.

CIS-16.name: Application Software Security
CIS-16.description: Manage the security life cycle of software deployed in production.

CIS-18.name: Penetration Testing
CIS-18.description: Establish a program to identify vulnerabilities and exposures through regular testing.
